page.title: 09CLUBS IN ASTON SOMERVILLE
page.content: The{Social Club}has been established for many years. A fee of 50p per year enables members to drink or play darts. During winter months dart matches are well supported. The {Bowling Club}is based at the Social Club. It has been established for over 50 years and has its own green. Flat green bowling is enjoyed during the summer with matches against visiting teams and club competitions. The{Youth {Club,}started in 1975, meets weekly. Members age 10+ enjoy snooker, table tennis, darts, football, rounders and other activities. The{Womens Institute began in 1974 and meets monthly. Visiting speakers talk on various subjects such as cookery, hobbies, safety in the home, hospices, travel. The W.I. takes an active interest in village affairs and raises money for local and national charities.
